messages.title: A strong local voice
messages.content: This election is a two horse race between Labour and the Tories. Labour's priority is to help our people and our economy out of the recession. The Tory priority is a huge cut to public services and a tax break for the super-rich.

messages.title: A hardworking local campaigner
messages.content: Ann stood up for me - Ann is a hardworking local campaigner. When I needed her, she took on one of the big banks for me and won. - Doris Pope, Local Resident

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will continue to campaign hard for new jobs for people here in Glasgow North.
I pledge to treat real support for people in work - tax credits and the minimum wage.
I know how important public services are to all our community, young and old - I will work to protect these services.
I will prioritise the fight against poverty - I believe it's the duty of government to support those most in need.
I pledge to you to continue to work hard for all the people of this constituency. It is a privilege to serve.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election is a two horse race between Labour and the Tories.

issues.economy: Labour's priority is to help our people and our economy out of the recession.
issues.socialWelfare: I will prioritise the fight against poverty - I believe it's the duty of government to support those most in need.

endorsements.endorsement: Ann is a hardworking local campaigner. When I needed her, she took on one of the big banks for me and won.

images.caption: Ann McKechin with supporters holding 'Scottish Labour' placards
